text: eeth thawama sathi dekayi.
susara sahodaraya ehema kiwwe ?
ohuge pusthakalaye wiski bothal pradarshanaya kota thibuni.
ee anuwa samajayen eyata labena pa්rathicharaya thibenawa.
wyapruthiye ithiriya mulumanin bhara wune sha්ri lanka aanduwatayi.
kaluthara disthrikkaye purna kalinawa wadakarapu ma dana siti dan nama amathaka sahodarayekuta math ekka yanna motar sayikalaya bara dunna.
homona prathikara walata aadeshaka lesa thawath aushadha warga rashiyak danata bhawitha karanawa.
waddo ehema karanawa kiyala ahapu bawak nam mathaka na..eeth udarata gamiyo kumbauru ata pawichchi kala oya wadeta.
me siyallama sidu wune ‘tama’ nisayi.
oyala karanna oone rassawal illala kagahana eka nemeyida

mese jiwitha pawathma digatama pawathwagena yannata upakara wana, aluthin nirmanaya kara ganna me keles gathi (bhawa) aluthin noupadawa warthamana mohotha sahamulinma e්wayin midi nidahas wima kala hakke – bhawa udura damimeni.

ee anuwa kawuru balayata pathwuwada rata thula sadacharayak, saubhagyayak athi nowana bawath idiriyatath wiwidha parihanikara thaththwayanta rata ha samajaya muhunapana bawath ee anuwa swabhawadharmaye noyekuth aakaraye kenehilikamwalata, pidawanta, danduwamwalata ratata ha janathawata muhuna pamata siduwana bawath itha pahadiliya.
thawath mawak bibisi sinhala sewaya samaga adahas palakaramin pawasuwe hamudawata baradun thama daruwa gana wagakima aanduwa sathu bawaya.

idiriyedi pihituwimata niyamitha e.ja.pa rajayaka thaniwama balaya pihituwimata hakiwuwath ee sandaha ekwana lesa anekuth pakshawalatada thaman aaradhana karana bawa hitapu amathya mangala samarawira mahatha prakasha karana ladi.
ape dimana oba loku jaya ganimata awasthawak laba, thanpathu kisidu kapawima ha ekathu kirimata, api karana cheri thattuwak lesa ", androyid jangama kasino kisidu thanpathu oba dina de thaba"!!

hamadena dihama balanne upekshawen ha dayawen.

migamuwa bandhanagaraye sirakaruwan 56kda mahara bandhanagarayen 46kda, walikada bandhanagarayen 28kda, kalutharin 42k, anuradhapura bandhanagarayen 39kda, agunakola palassa bandhanagarayen 06kda washayen sirakaruwan nidahas kara atha.

shri lanka krikat kandayama pasugiya wasare pakisthanaya samanga pawathwu tharangawaliyedi kusal janith perera gen labaganna lada muthra sampalawala thahanam uththejaka thibu bawata me doha katar rasayanagaraya labadun warthawak anuwa kridakayata thawakalika tharaga thahanamak panawu athara wissayi20 loka kusalana tharagawaliyada ahimiwi giyeya.
ee pilibanda wadagath purawruththa liyawi atha.
me yojanawaliyehi da wikalpayak idiripath kirima mangin balaporoththu wanne e් aramuna ishta karaganimata ya.

danata wiharasthanaye sita gamata margaya thani aththe mema wawe bamma mathini.

lokaye boho denage, wisheshayenma tharuna paramparawe kalaya kadamimata hethuwana, anawashya sabandathawalata patalimata, parapidakayin athin pidawata pathwimata menma lingikawa apayojanayata ha mewani hethun matha siyadiwi hanikaraganimata pawa pelambaawim athikarana sabawinma samaja wyadhiyak bawata pathwa athi fesbuk lowa pura anthawadi matha pathirawimata, wyaja prawruththi pathirawimata ha jathiwadi gatum awissawima sandahada wiwidha awasthawadin yoda gannawa.
methek ma dutu karunu anuwa namal hata ithamath dipthimath deshapalana anagathayak himiyi.
eya kawada lankawata eyda danneth na.
wimal kiwwe gugal warjanaya karanna.

kese namuth danda nithi sangrahaye widhiwidhanawalata anuwa ewani pudgalayanta wiruddhawa nadu pawarime ayithiyak pidawata path pudgalaya sathu we.
